AboutMe.text: I design and construct a website. I ensure that the site meets user expectations by making sure it looks good, runs smoothly, and offers an easy access point without page-to-page loading issues or error messages. I can also change a website interface design in the form of graphic design into static web files in the form of HTML, CSS & JS.
